titleStmt.title: A true patterne of pietie meete for all Christian householders to looke vpon, for the better education of their families, in the feare and seruice of almightie God. Collected out of the fountaine of holy scriptures, for the especiall vse of the faithfull in the congregation of Malpasse in Cheshire. By Iohn Parker.
titleStmt.author: Parker, John, 1534-1592.

titleStmt.title: A true patterne of pietie meete for all Christian householders to looke vpon, for the better education of their families, in the feare and seruice of almightie God. Collected out of the fountaine of holy scriptures, for the especiall vse of the faithfull in the congregation of Malpasse in Cheshire. By Iohn Parker.
titleStmt.author: Parker, John, 1534-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [J. Danter for?] Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop within the Popes head Alley, in Lumbard strete,

notesStmt.note: Actual printer's name conjectured by STC.
Print faded on title page, affecting imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
